alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 430 PM MST... At 346 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sentinel, or 27 miles west of Gila Bend, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sentinel. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 71 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Tonopah Desert
